# useCamera

```Luau
function useCamera(
  scope: Fusion.Scope
): StateObject<Camera>
```

Returns a state object with the current camera. Updates when the current camera changes.

---

## Arguments

### scope `: Fusion.Scope`

The scope to store cleanup tasks.

---

### Returns `: StateObject<Camera>`

A state object with the current camera.
